item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 12, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump expected to nominate China hawk Rubio for secretary of state
2. Brussels to free up billions of euros for defence and security from EU budget
3. Who’s who in the Musk ‘A-team’ vying to shape Trump 2.0
4. [Opinion] Trump’s European allies think history is turning in their direction
5. Citadel poaches Elliott Management veteran Bhanji
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 12, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
